description: The `Orchestration & Planning` subsystem serves as the central control for the CodeBoarding pipeline, managing the entire analysis process from initial project metadata assessment and strategic planning to driving the final diagram generation.

components.name: Analysis Orchestrator
components.description: Coordinates the overall code analysis and diagram generation pipeline, initiating and managing the flow between different analysis stages.

components.name: Metadata Analyzer
components.description: Extracts and interprets high-level project metadata, including structure, technologies, and contextual information, to guide deeper code analysis.

components.name: Analysis Planner
components.description: Strategizes and plans the code analysis process, determining the scope, depth, and specific steps required for effective code comprehension, potentially leveraging AI/LLM capabilities.

components.name: Static Code Scanner
components.description: Performs foundational static analysis of the project's source code, systematically scanning files, identifying code elements, and extracting raw structural and syntactic information.

components.name: Diagram Generator
components.description: Manages the transformation of structured analysis insights into visual diagrams, facilitating the understanding of code structure, relationships, and overall architecture.

components_relations.relation: uses context to define analysis steps and instructs
performs analysis and provides results back to
